sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'; import './styles.css' import { Col } from 'react-bootstrap' const Product = (props) => { const handleOnclick = (e) => { console.log(props.id) } return ( {props.name} ${props.amount} ) } export default Product
